name: SPIDER (itch) (minesmart)
description:
A cricket happened to jump on a wooden table with a plant and a journal book. The cricket spotted a deathly spider, so help the cricket not to get killed. Move around with your mouse pointer, run away from the deathly spider.

HAVE FUN :) 

NOTE: THIS IS JUST A BASIC TEST, SO DON'T EXPECT IT TO BE A LONG GAME OR SOMETHING.
